inclusion.criterion: tumor cell expression of ER and/or PR and ErbB2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one bidimensionally measurable lesion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient should have life expectancy of 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient must have adequate hematologic function: absolute neutrophil count (ANC) 1000/mm3; platelets 75,000/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient must have adequate renal and liver function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient must give written informed consent prior to initiation of any invasive study-related procedures that would otherwise not be performed, and must be able to comply with scheduled visits and evaluations
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior anthracycline exposure in adjuvant setting > 360 mg/m2
exclusion.label: unknown
